dash.name: 关于 DASH / FLV / MP4
dash.desc: Do not modify this lightly. If you need to make changes, please read: {0} and make sure you understand what you're doing.

settings.title: Settings
settings.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete? This action cannot be undone.

paths.name: Path
paths.desc: "Temp Files" stores incomplete downloads, and moved to "Output Files" after processing.

cache.name: Cache
cache.desc: "Database" stores config, login state, download history, etc. It's recommended to backup it frequently.

default.name: Default Options
default.desc: When downloading, these options will be used first. If the target resource lacks them, the highest available options will be used.

auto_download.name: Auto Start Download
auto_download.desc: If enabled, download will start automatically after adding a task.

max_conc.name: Max Concurrent Download
max_conc.desc: Controls the maximum numbers of tasks processed concurrently. A high value may increase risk of being flagged.

protobuf_danmaku.name: Use Protobuf API for Danmaku
protobuf_danmaku.desc: If enabled, it fetches nearly the full danmaku pool for the resource, but the process will take more time.

add_metadata.name: Embed Metadata Automatically
add_metadata.desc: If enabled, media info like Title and Description will be embedded into the file after download.

format.name: Naming Format
format.desc: If the target resource lacks a variable, it will be replaced with "-1".

info.title: About
info.paid: This is a freeware and also a public-benefit project. If you paid for it, you may have been scammed.
info.star: If you find it useful, consider giving the project a Star on GitHub!
info.data: All data generated and acquired will be stored locally on the user's device only.
